member.name: T:System.Web.Razor.CSharpRazorCodeLanguage
member.summary: This type/member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. Represents a Razor code language that is based on C# syntax.

member.summary: This type/member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. Creates a new Razor code generator based on C# code language.
member.returns: The newly created Razor code generator based on C# code language.
member.param: The class name for the generated code.
The name of the root namespace for the generated code.
The name of the source code file.

member.summary: This type/member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. Creates a new code parser for C# code language.
member.returns: The newly created code parser for C# code language.

member.summary: This type/member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. Gets the name of the C# code language.
member.returns: The name of the C# code language. Value is ‘csharp’.
